00026 #pragma once
00027 
00028 #include <l4/cxx/l4types.h>
00029 #include <l4/cxx/basic_ostream>
00030 #include <l4/sys/err.h>
00031 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00032 
00033 
00039 
00040 #ifndef L4_CXX_NO_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE
00041 # define L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE 20
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #if defined(L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE)
00045 #include <l4/util/backtrace.h>
00046 #endif
00047 
00049 namespace L4
00050 {
00051 
00064   class Exception_tracer
00065   {
00066 #if defined(L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE)
00067   private:
00068     void *_pc_array[L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE];
00069     int   _frame_cnt;
00070 
00071   protected:
00075 #if defined(__PIC__)
00076     Exception_tracer() throw() : _frame_cnt(0) {}
00077 #else
00078     Exception_tracer() throw() : _frame_cnt(l4util_backtrace(_pc_array, L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE)) {}
00079 #endif
00080 
00081   public:
00085     void const *const *pc_array() const throw() { return _pc_array; }
00089     int frame_count() const throw() { return _frame_cnt; }
00090 #else
00091   protected:
00095     Exception_tracer() throw() {}
00096 
00097   public:
00101     void const *const *pc_array() const throw() { return 0; }
00105     int frame_count() const throw() { return 0; }
00106 #endif
00107   };
00108 
00117   class Base_exception : public Exception_tracer
00118   {
00119   protected:
00121     Base_exception() throw() {}
00122 
00123   public:
00127     virtual char const *str() const throw () = 0;
00128 
00130     virtual ~Base_exception() throw () {}
00131   };
00132 
00140   class Runtime_error : public Base_exception
00141   {
00142   private:
00143     long _errno;
00144     char _extra[80];
00145 
00146   public:
00147     explicit Runtime_error(long err_no, char const *extra = 0) throw ()
00148       : _errno(err_no)
00149     {
00150       if (!extra)
00151         _extra[0] = 0;
00152       else
00153         {
00154           for (unsigned i = 0; i < sizeof(_extra) && extra[i]; ++i)
00155             _extra[i] = extra[i];
00156           _extra[sizeof(_extra) - 1] = 0;
00157         }
00158     }
00159     char const *str() const throw ()
00160     { return l4sys_errtostr(_errno); }
00161     char const *extra_str() const { return _extra; }
00162     ~Runtime_error() throw () {}
00163 
00164     long err_no() const throw() { return _errno; }
00165   };
00166 
00171   class Out_of_memory : public Runtime_error
00172   {
00173   public:
00175     explicit Out_of_memory(char const *extra = "") throw()
00176     : Runtime_error(-L4_ENOMEM, extra) {}
00178     ~Out_of_memory() throw() {}
00179   };
00180 
00181 
00186   class Element_already_exists : public Runtime_error
00187   {
00188   public:
00189     explicit Element_already_exists(char const *e = "") throw()
00190     : Runtime_error(-L4_EEXIST, e) {}
00191     ~Element_already_exists() throw() {}
00192   };
00193 
00202   class Unknown_error : public Base_exception
00203   {
00204   public:
00205     Unknown_error() throw() {}
00206     char const *str() const throw() { return "unknown error"; }
00207     ~Unknown_error() throw() {}
00208   };
00209 
00210   
00215   class Element_not_found : public Runtime_error
00216   {
00217   public:
00218     explicit Element_not_found(char const *e = "") throw()
00219     : Runtime_error(-L4_ENOENT, e) {}
00220   };
00221 
00229   class Invalid_capability : public Base_exception
00230   {
00231   private:
00232     Cap<void> const _o;
00233 
00234   public:
00239     explicit Invalid_capability(Cap<void> const &o) throw() : _o(o) {}
00240     template< typename T>
00241     explicit Invalid_capability(Cap<T> const &o) throw() : _o(o.cap()) {}
00242     char const *str() const throw() { return "invalid object"; }
00243 
00248     Cap<void> const &cap() const throw() { return _o; }
00249     ~Invalid_capability() throw() {}
00250   };
00251 
00258   class Com_error : public Runtime_error
00259   {
00260   public:
00265     explicit Com_error(long err) throw() : Runtime_error(err) {}
00266 
00267     ~Com_error() throw() {}
00268   };
00269 
00273   class Bounds_error : public Runtime_error
00274   {
00275   public:
00276     explicit Bounds_error(char const *e = "") throw()
00277     : Runtime_error(-L4_ERANGE, e) {}
00278     ~Bounds_error() throw() {}
00279   };
00281 };
00282 
00283 inline
00284 L4::BasicOStream &
00285 operator << (L4::BasicOStream &o, L4::Base_exception const &e)
00286 {
00287   o << "Exception: " << e.str() << ", backtrace ...\n";
00288   for (int i = 0; i < e.frame_count(); ++i)
00289     o << L4::n_hex(l4_addr_t(e.pc_array()[i])) << '\n';
00290 
00291   return o;
00292 }
00293 
00294 inline
00295 L4::BasicOStream &
00296 operator << (L4::BasicOStream &o, L4::Runtime_error const &e)
00297 {
00298   o << "Exception: " << e.str() << ": ";
00299   if (e.extra_str())
00300     o << e.extra_str() << ": ";
00301   o << "backtrace ...\n";
00302   for (int i = 0; i < e.frame_count(); ++i)
00303     o << L4::n_hex(l4_addr_t(e.pc_array()[i])) << '\n';
00304 
00305   return o;
00306 }
